trans-unit.source: Enables the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.WebScriptEnablingBehavior"></xref> for an endpoint through configuration.
trans-unit.target: Permite que o <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.WebScriptEnablingBehavior"> </xref> para um ponto de extremidade por meio da configuração.

trans-unit.source: The WebScriptEnablingElement is a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.BehaviorExtensionElement> subtype that can be used to include the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WebScriptEnablingBehavior> on an endpoint through configuration.
trans-unit.target: O WebScriptEnablingElement é um <xref:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.BehaviorExtensionElement>subtipo que pode ser usado para incluir o <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WebScriptEnablingBehavior>em um ponto de extremidade por meio da configuração.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WebScriptEnablingBehavior> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.BehaviorExtensionElement>

trans-unit.source: There are no configurable properties on this element.
trans-unit.target: Não há nenhuma propriedade configurável neste elemento.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WebScriptEnablingBehavior>, in turn, allows an endpoint to be accessed by ASP.NET AJAX Web pages when it is configured with the <xref:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpBinding>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WebScriptEnablingBehavior>, por sua vez, permite que um ponto de extremidade ser acessado por páginas da Web do ASP.NET AJAX, quando ele é configurado com o <xref:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpBinding>.</xref:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpBinding> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WebScriptEnablingBehavior>

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[crabout](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] how to enable a [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] service to respond to ASP.NET AJAX clients, see [Creating WCF Services for ASP.NET AJAX](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[crabout](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]como habilitar um [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] serviço para responder aos clientes do ASP.NET AJAX, consulte [criando serviços WCF para o ASP.NET AJAX](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Configuration.WebScriptEnablingElement"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Configuration.WebScriptEnablingElement"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Gets the type of the behavior enabled by this configuration element.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o tipo do comportamento habilitado por este elemento de configuração.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Type> for the behavior enabled with the configuration element: <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.WebScriptEnablingBehavior"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Type>para o comportamento habilitado com o elemento de configuração: <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.WebScriptEnablingBehavior"> </xref>.</xref:System.Type>
